name: npc_dota_hero_templar_assassin
bio_loc:
Lanaya, the Templar Assassin, came to her calling by a path of curious inquiry. Possessed of a scientific bent, she spent her early years engaged in meticulous study of nature's laws--peering into grimoires of magic and alchemy, recreating experiments from charred fragments of the Violet Archives, and memorizing observations of the Keen recordkeepers. Already quiet and secretive by nature, the difficulty of acquiring these objects further reinforced her skills of stealth. Had she been less retiring, she might have become notorious among the guilds as a thief-scholar. Instead her investigations led her into far more obscure corners.

As she devoted her furtive talents to unlocking the secrets of the universe, she instead unlocked a secret door that exists in nature itself: the entryway to the most Hidden Temple. The intelligences that waited beyond that portal, proved to be expecting her, and whatever mysteries they revealed in the moment of their discovery was nothing compared to the answers they held out to Lanaya should she continue in their service. She swore to protect the mysteries, but more to the point, in service to the Hidden Temple she satisfies her endless craving for understanding. In the eyes of each foe she expunges, a bit more of the mystery is revealed.
hype_loc: Peppering the battlefield with slowing traps, Templar Assassin hides invisibly, ready to ambush her prey. Once she springs her attack, she shreds enemies with piercing psionic blades, and deflects counterattacks with her refracting shield.

facets.description_loc: Refraction gains a damage charge every time a shield charge gets consumed.
facets.name: templar_assassin_refractor

abilities.name: templar_assassin_refraction
abilities.desc_loc: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, gaining a small shield gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances. If a shield is consumed, a new one is created as long as there are charges left. If an instance of damage would deal more damage than the remaining shield, all of the damage is absorbed
abilities.lore_loc: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
notes_loc: Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).
Only instances of %damage_threshold% or more damage will trigger Refraction.
facets_loc: Whenever a shield instance is consumed, Templar Assassin gains a damage instance.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_meld
abilities.desc_loc: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for %abilityduration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
notes_loc: Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position or channeling Psionic Projection.
Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_psi_blades
abilities.desc_loc: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.
abilities.lore_loc: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
notes_loc: Attack effects like Bash will only be applied to the main target.
facets_loc: Enemies hit by Psi Blades split damage are slowed.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_trap_teleport
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for %abilitychanneltime% seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing %extra_damage% bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
abilities.lore_loc: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_psionic_trap
abilities.desc_loc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they deal a small amount of damage and exert a slowing influence of %movement_speed_min%%% in the area. Traps charge up to slow %movement_speed_max%%% after %trap_max_charge_duration% seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
abilities.lore_loc: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
notes_loc: They have invisibility that fades in over %trap_fade_time% seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.
Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases max trap count and trap vision range.  When activated, traps now silence affected enemies.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_refraction_disable_cast
talents.name_loc: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_8
talents.name_loc: +{s:value} Psi Blades Attack and Spill Range

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_4
talents.desc_loc: Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.
